1_20230501120000.title: Federal Reserve Signals Potential Rate Hike
1_20230501120000.content: The Federal Reserve has signaled it may raise interest rates at its next meeting, citing concerns about inflation and strong employment data. Analysts expect a 25 basis point increase.
1_20230501120000.description: Fed officials hint at upcoming rate increase to combat inflation pressures

2_20230502093000.title: Apple Reports Record Quarterly Earnings
2_20230502093000.content: Apple Inc. reported record quarterly earnings, beating analyst expectations with $97.3 billion in revenue, up 9% year over year. iPhone sales remained strong despite supply chain challenges.
2_20230502093000.description: Tech giant exceeds expectations with strong iPhone and services growth

3_20230503140000.title: Oil Prices Fall on Increased Supply Forecasts
3_20230503140000.content: Global oil prices fell by over 3% today after OPEC+ announced plans to increase production next month. The decision comes amid concerns about slowing global demand and economic uncertainties.
3_20230503140000.description: Crude futures decline as OPEC+ plans production increase

4_20230504110000.title: Tesla Unveils New EV Battery Technology
4_20230504110000.content: Tesla announced a breakthrough in battery technology that could extend range by 30% and reduce production costs. The company plans to implement the new batteries in vehicles starting next year.
4_20230504110000.description: New battery tech promises longer range and lower costs for electric vehicles

5_20230505153000.title: Housing Market Shows Signs of Cooling
5_20230505153000.content: The U.S. housing market is showing signs of cooling as mortgage rates rise and inventory increases. Home sales decreased 3.5% month-over-month, while the median home price growth slowed to 5.2% annually.
5_20230505153000.description: Rising mortgage rates and increasing inventory lead to slowdown in home sales
